          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of volcano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung des Vulkans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation de volcan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do vulcão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione del vulcano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός του ηφαιστείου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del volcán</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the stages of volcano formation. Molten rock from the Earth's mantle is forced up in the earth's crust and flows out as lava which gradually builds up a cone-shaped mountain as it cools down.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lava</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molten rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solid rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">volcano</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Stadien der 
Vulkananordnung. Flüssiger Felsen vom Umhang der Masse wird 
oben in der Kruste der Masse erzwungen und fließt heraus während 
Lava, die stufenweise einen kegelförmigen Berg aufbaut, während sie 
unten abkühlt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les étapes de la 
formation de volcan. La roche fondue du manteau de la terre est 
forcée vers le haut dans la croûte de terre et sort pendant que la 
lave qui accumule graduellement une montagne en forme de cône pendant
qu'elle refroidit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os estágios da 
formação do vulcão. A rocha derretida do mantle da terra é 
forçada acima na crosta de terra e flui para fora enquanto a lava que
constrói gradualmente acima de uma montanha cone-shaped enquanto 
esfria para baixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le fasi di formazione
del vulcano. La roccia fusa dal manto della terra è forzata in 
su nella crosta terrestre ed esce mentre lava che sviluppa 
gradualmente una montagna a forma di cono mentre si raffredda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τα στάδια του σχηματισμού
ηφαιστείων. Ο λειωμένος βράχος από το γήινο μανδύα 
αναγκάζεται επάνω στη γήινη κρούστα και ρέει έξω ως λάβα που 
ενισχύει βαθμιαία ένα κωνικό βουνό καθώς δροσίζει κάτω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las etapas de la 
formación del volcán. La roca fundida de la capa de la tierra 
se fuerza para arriba en la corteza de tierra y fluye hacia fuera 
mientras que la lava que acumula gradualmente una montaña cónica 
mientras que se refresca abajo.</string>
          </description>
